title: 12 Topsail Road, Burin, NL A0E1E0 House For Sale | RE/MAX | 1266677
text: Property Description for 12 Topsail Road Ideal and cozy starter or retirement home that is move in ready and the sellers are willing to leave furnished. This lovely 2 bedroom home is looking for new owners and has had many recent upgrades. The master bedroom is really spacious. A new survey was completed in July of 2022. The exterior was updated in 2018 and this included the shingles, windows, doors the addition of the porch /laundry area and new siding and facia. A new deck was added in 2023. Plumbing and electrical was also updated in 2022 and the home was painted throughout. IF you are presently paying rent then this is the perfect opportunity to get yourself into a home to call yours. All measurements are to be verified by the purchasers. ....this home is priced to sell.
